basics.name: Kaialii Sequeira
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student at UH Manoa in the B.S. in Computer Science program with an estimated time of transitioning into the Masters program in 2023. I plan to transition into the Ph.D program after that to ginally graduate in 2024-2025.

highlights: Attended Schoolhouse for Air Defense Command, Control, Communications, Computers Integrator (C4I) Tactical Operations Center Enhanced Operator, Military Occupational Specialty.

work.position: (14J) Air Defense Command, Control, Communications, Computers Integrator (C4I) Tactical Operations Center Enhanced Operator
highlights: Conducted movements and exercises to train and re-certify soldiers to keep them proficient in army procedures and combat techniques making them viable team members ready to carry out orders from higher command and accomplish the mission with little to no deficiencies.

work.position: (14J) Air Defense Command, Control, Communications, Computers Integrator (C4I) Tactical Operations Center Enhanced Operator
work.summary: Deployed (1 Year) to Iraq for Operation Iraqi Freedom
highlights: Given orders to soldiers to develop professional, and well-trained soldiers to be the Trainer or Subject Matter Expert to inevitably teach the organization on annual training of our capabilities of Air Defense Artillery.

work.position: (14G) Air Defense Command, Control, Communications, Computers Integrator (C4I) Tactical Operations Center Enhanced Operator
work.summary: Air Defense Battle Management System Operator
highlights: Army transitioned my occupation code from 14J to 14G. In Korea for a multinational exercise among different elements and entities both American and Republic of Korean Forces.

work.position: (14G) Air Defense Command, Control, Communications, Computers Integrator (C4I) Tactical Operations Center Enhanced Operator
work.summary: Air Defense Battle Management System Operator
highlights: Airspace Management Sergeant. With the supervision over three soldiers, our Air Missile Defense cell was integrated with the Aviation section to create the Airspace Management section.

work.position: (25B) Information Technology Specialist/Network Operations Team Leader
work.summary: Air Defense Battle Management System Operator
highlights: Provide Help Desk system administrator and customer support to brigade and subordinate units; diagnosis, repair, and troubleshoot operating systems, software applications, and software and hardware; install, setup and configure workstations for users to access the tactical networks.
